title: Search Results Page Business Flow
description: Describes the flow and behavior when a user performs a search and views the results page.

steps.user_action: Enter a keyword in the search bar and press Enter
steps.expected_behavior: Search results page loads showing products matching the keyword

steps.user_action: View list of products matching the search
steps.expected_behavior: Each product shows name, image, price, and link to detail page

steps.user_action: Click on a product from the search results
steps.expected_behavior: Navigates to the corresponding product detail page

steps.user_action: Refine search by changing keyword and pressing Enter again
steps.expected_behavior: Search results update to reflect new keyword

steps.user_action: Perform a search with no matching results
steps.expected_behavior: System shows a message indicating no products were found
